Text: HEY GUY'S PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU READ THIS POST!!!!! YOU MOST LIKELY (WILL) HAVE CONTROLLER ISSUES, AND HERE IS THE REASON WHY. AFTER YOU INSTALL THE GAME, "DO NOT" RUN IT YET!
